AccountContactClarifyingText:
In accordance with the Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698 ('Law'), this Clarification Text has been prepared by Foramind to inform you, as the data subject, about the processing of your personal data.

The personal data you provide through this contact form is processed by our Company as the data controller, in accordance with the principles set forth in the Law, to respond to your requests and suggestions, to improve our products and services, and to provide better service.

Your personal data may be shared with third-party service providers to fulfill the purposes mentioned above, legal authorities when requested, and business partners when necessary, in accordance with the Law.

As a data subject, you have the right to request information about your personal data, to request correction if it is incomplete or inaccurate, to request deletion or destruction under certain conditions, to object to the processing, and to claim damages if you suffer loss due to unlawful processing.
ContactClarifyingText:
This privacy notice explains how we collect, use, share, and protect the personal information you provide through our contact form.

When you submit information through our contact form, we collect and process your name, email address, and any other details you provide in your message. We use this information solely to respond to your inquiry, address your concerns, and improve our services.

Your data is securely stored and only accessed by authorized personnel who need it to assist you. We will not share your information with third parties except when legally required or with your explicit consent.

We retain your contact information only for as long as necessary to respond to your inquiry and maintain a record of our communication, after which it will be securely deleted.
CookiePolicyText:
Our website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us identify your browser and preferences.

We use essential cookies that are necessary for the website to function properly. We also use analytical cookies to understand how visitors interact with our site, helping us improve its functionality. Additionally, we may use marketing cookies to deliver more relevant content based on your interests.

You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences. Most browsers allow you to block or delete cookies, though this may impact your experience on our site.

By continuing to use our website, you consent to our use of cookies as described in this policy. We review our cookie practices regularly to ensure compliance with privacy regulations.
feedbackClarifyingText:
Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We value your opinion as it helps us improve our services and better meet your needs.

When you submit feedback, we collect personal information such as your name and contact details, along with your comments or suggestions. This information is processed solely for the purpose of understanding and addressing your feedback, improving our products and services, and contacting you if follow-up is needed.

Your feedback may be shared internally with relevant teams to implement improvements. We may also use anonymized feedback for quality control and training purposes.

We retain your feedback information for a reasonable period to allow for proper analysis and implementation of improvements. Your personal data is handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy and applicable data protection laws.
MembershipAgreementText:
MEMBERSHIP AGREEMENT

This Membership Agreement regulates the rights and obligations between you, our valued members, and Foramind who will use the Foramind platform.

1. Definitions

'Foramind': The digital platform that provides mind mapping creation and sharing services.
'Member': The natural or legal person who registers on the platform and benefits from the services.
'Service': All online services and content offered by Foramind.

2. Membership

2.1. Membership can be realized by natural persons over the age of 18 and legal entities.
2.2. The Member undertakes that all information specified in the registration form is correct.
2.3. The Member is obliged to update this information in case of changes in the registration information.

3. Password and Security

3.1. The Member is responsible for the security of the password they set.
3.2. The Member is personally responsible for all transactions performed on their account.
3.3. The Member must notify Foramind immediately when they notice that their account is being used without permission.

4. Use of Services

4.1. The Member agrees to use Foramind services for legal purposes.
4.2. The Member does not have the right to copy, reproduce, or publish content on the platform.
4.3. The Member is responsible for all content they share on the platform.

5. Intellectual Property Rights

5.1. All content, graphics, design, system, and logos of Foramind are the intellectual property of Foramind.
5.2. The Member cannot use or copy these intellectual property rights without the written permission of Foramind.

6. Termination of Membership

6.1. The Member can close their account at any time.
6.2. Foramind may suspend or terminate membership if the member violates the terms of the agreement.

7. Other Provisions

7.1. Foramind reserves the right to make unilateral changes to this agreement.
7.2. Changes will be announced through the platform.

This agreement becomes valid between the parties upon approval during registration.
RegisterClarifyingText:
At Foramind, we value the security of your personal data. Under the Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698, the personal information we collect during registration is processed solely for the purpose of providing services to you, creating and managing your account.

Basic information you provide in the registration form such as name, surname, email, and password will be used to create your user account, verify your identity, provide personalized services, and contact you when necessary.

Your personal data will not be shared with third parties other than our service providers, and will not be transferred to other institutions and organizations without your consent, except for legal obligations.

As a Foramind user, you have rights such as accessing, correcting, deleting your personal data, and objecting to processing. You can reach us through our communication channels when you want to exercise these rights.
